title: Ep 308: Erik Griffin & Khalyla's Lingerie

description:
Bobby is Iron Hole. Erik is Sniffy. Gilbert is The Plug. Khalyla knows Mojo. We talk Tony Hinchcliffe's Asian jokes, Hallway Bobby, Pirate Accents, and Khalyla's Cat Shelter.
